summary: Completed comprehensive testing of FlashBot DeFi arbitrage bot dashboard. All backend APIs (11/11) and frontend features working perfectly with full integration.
passed_tests: All 11 backend API endpoints (health, stats, opportunities, trades, logs, status, settings)
All 6 stats cards load with proper data (Net Profit, Win Rate, Total Trades, Opportunities, Best Trade, Avg Profit)
Tab navigation between Opportunities and Trades works perfectly
Opportunities table displays 15 sample opportunities with realistic data
Trades table displays 10 sample trades with TX hashes and profit data
Live Logs panel shows 30 real-time log entries
Settings panel opens/closes on gear icon click
Settings can be modified and saved successfully
Backend seeds realistic sample data on startup
Real-time data updates via API polling
No error messages or UI bugs detected
